about.title: About Moshrif Platform
about.introduction: Moshrif Platform is a comprehensive digital solution for managing projects and activities related to contracting, technical and financial supervision of buildings, providing a smart and advanced experience that contributes to improving performance and accelerating project implementation with high quality and efficiency.
about.whyMoshrifDesc: In light of the rapid technological development, it has become necessary to rely on digital solutions that facilitate construction and supervision processes and ensure achieving goals with the highest standards. Moshrif Platform provides advanced tools that enable users to manage their projects efficiently, from planning to final delivery.
about.feature1Desc: The platform facilitates communication between all parties involved in the project, ensuring work transparency and quick decision-making.
about.feature2Desc: All operations and updates are recorded electronically, contributing to data archiving and easy reference when needed.
about.feature3Desc: The platform helps monitor costs and expenses, enhancing financial control and ensuring the highest levels of efficiency.
about.feature4Desc: The platform provides the ability to retrieve technical and financial reports at any time, facilitating analysis and appropriate decision-making.
about.feature5Desc: The platform connects owners, supervisors, and contractors, ensuring work proceeds regularly according to the planned schedule.
about.feature6Desc: Enables users to receive instant notifications about project progress or any necessary updates.
about.feature7Desc: The platform provides a digital system for storing contracts and documents, ensuring easy access at any time.
about.feature8Desc: The platform allows recording supply and ensuring materials are available at the right time.
about.feature9Desc: The platform relies on advanced technologies to protect user data and ensure information confidentiality.
about.step1Desc: The owner or contractor enters project data and details through the platform.
about.step2Desc: Supervisors and engineers responsible for implementation and follow-up are identified.
about.step3Desc: Project stages are recorded step by step with electronic documentation of all operations.
about.step4Desc: Financial and technical reports can be extracted with high accuracy when needed.
about.step5Desc: The platform provides direct communication channels between all parties to ensure achieving goals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.helpDesc: Our technical support team is available to help you with any inquiry or problem you face. Don't hesitate to contact us.
